author: Victor Solé Ferioli

goal.outcome_goal: Hold single-leg balance with eyes closed for 15 seconds each leg by end of Week 2
progress_goals: Perform single-leg reaches without touching the floor for 8 reps
Improve postural control during basic strength exercises (e.g., squats, lunges)

sessions.name: Session 1 (Indoor)
components: Standing balance on one foot (3x15 sec/side)
Tandem stance toe-to-heel hold (3x20 sec)
Glute bridge hold (3x30 sec)
Wall-supported single-leg calf raises (2x10/side)

sessions.name: Session 2 (Outdoor)
components: Walk heel-to-toe in a straight line (3x15 steps)
One-leg balance on uneven surface (grass)
Standing knee lift holds (3x10 sec/side)
Side step-over drills (low cone or curb)

sessions.name: Session 3 (Indoor)
components: Balance pad or pillow: 3 rounds of single-leg hold, forward reach, side reach (5 reps each)
Core finisher: Bird-Dog (3x8 per side)

sessions.name: Session 1 (Indoor/Outdoor)
components: Single-leg reach (front, side, diagonal) – 2x8 per leg
Step-downs from low step (2x10 per leg)
Bear crawl 4 steps forward/back x 3 sets
Balance hold + resistance band pull (lateral) – 2x10 each side

sessions.name: Session 2 (Outdoor)
components: Low agility ladder walk (or draw with chalk): single-leg steps
Curved walking paths (2x5 mins each direction)
Hops to stick balance (mini jumps hold for 2 sec)
Walking lunges with pause (2x10 steps)

sessions.name: Session 3 (Indoor)
components: 3-round circuit: BOSU or pillow balance toss, Squat with heel raise at top, Split stance hold + overhead reach
Finish with supine leg raise core activation (3x10)

notes: Hold near a support object for safety
Combine with resistance or cardio days for integrated neuromuscular benefits
